# truncationMode

**Instance Property**

Determines how the text is truncated to fit within the receiver’s bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
var truncationMode: CATextLayerTruncationMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The possible values are described in [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/truncation-modes]. Defaults to [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATextLayerTruncationMode/none].

## Text Alignment and Truncation

- **isWrapped**: Determines whether the text is wrapped to fit within the receiver’s bounds.
- **alignmentMode**: Determines how individual lines of text are horizontally aligned within the receiver’s bounds.
